name: Madness: Hitman for Hire (Minecraft Map) DEMO
name_original: Madness: Hitman for Hire (Minecraft Map) DEMO
description:
Madness Hitman for Hire is multiple  Minecraft Adventure maps where you play as Hank Wimbleton and you are hired by the Broken Glass Kids army to destroy Federation military bases across the world but not everything is as it seems with Broken Glass Kids find out the secrets the BGK army are trying to hide and bring an end to this retched war

This DEMO consist of the first episode of Madness Hitman For Hire
